<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get information from a specific destination account"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/destination-account/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint returns the information of a specific destination account by passing the accounts ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
